divs: Sighting DetailsI was traveling southbound on I35 about five miles outside of Des Moines. When I saw flashing lights in the sky. At first I thought it was a helicopter, but the closer I got to the object the more clear it became to me and my cousin that it was not a aircraft that we have ever seen. I know aircraft having served seven years in the Us Army and having a brother that flies Apache Helicopters. Above the Northbound lane hovering maybe 75 to 100 feet above the tree line was a triangle shaped craft with white lights at 3 points of the triangle with red lights scatering the bottom of the craft. In the center was a big white light that resembled a spot light. The lights all flashed in a completely random fashion. After hovering for a few minutes the craft turned vertical and began to fly west at a high rate of speed. My cousin tried to snap a picture with his cell phone but by the time he got the camera up the object was already several miles away. I have never seen anything like it before and the vision is seared into my mind.
trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Des Moines
There were no other sightings in Des Moines on or around November 9th 2008
